channel.title: [Javac Error] 562 Compiler!
channel.description:
Hey Eveyone! I have been having troubles Compiling a 562 Compiler, and I get a Javac error.
My Problem:
[b]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/b]
I have jdk1.6.0_18 and jre6...
This is what the Compiler says:
[b]@echo off cd . javac -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java pause[/b]
Please help me with this Problem!
-Dylan

item.title: [Javac Error] 562 Compiler!
item.dc:creator: @fighter_aid fighter aid
item.description:
@fighter_aid wrote:

@echo off
title W00tSc4p3 Compiler
echo Compiling Net
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/io/*.java
echo Complete.
pause

Blue = Your JDK Version

Red = Your Folders

If you have Problems with the folders PM me

Read full topic

item.title: [Javac Error] 562 Compiler!
item.dc:creator: @rangeskill16 rangeskill16
item.description:
@rangeskill16 wrote:

Hey Eveyone!
I have been having troubles Compiling a 562 Compiler, and I get a Javac error.

My Problem:

‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

I have jdk1.6.0_18 and jre6…

This is what the Compiler says:

@echo off
cd .
javac -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java
pause

Please help me with this Problem!

-Dylan
